body_html:
The tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column has no initializer value set. If you don't set it then defaults to tf.truncated_normal_initializer with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1/sqrt(sparse_id_column.length).

So,the warning states that A new changed implementation for default of standard deviation will be 1/sqrt(dimension) after 2017/02/25 instead of 1/sqrt(vocab_size)
body_text:
The tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column has no initializer value set. If you don't set it then defaults to tf.truncated_normal_initializer with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1/sqrt(sparse_id_column.length).
So,the warning states that A new changed implementation for default of standard deviation  will be 1/sqrt(dimension) after 2017/02/25 instead of 1/sqrt(vocab_size)
body:
The `tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column` has no `initializer` value set. If you don't set it then defaults to `tf.truncated_normal_initializer` with mean 0.0 and `standard deviation 1/sqrt(sparse_id_column.length).`

So,the warning states that A new changed implementation for default of standard deviation  will be `1/sqrt(dimension)` after 2017/02/25 instead of `1/sqrt(vocab_size)`
